Title: Last Christmas
Writer: George Michael (inspired by: the song "Last Christmas",  written and composed by), Emma Thompson (story by), Greg Wise (story by), Emma Thompson (screenplay by), Bryony Kimmings (screenplay by)
Actors: Madison Ingoldsby, Emma Thompson, Boris Isakovic, Lucy Miller
Plot: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.
